statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_fraud_detection;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE suspicious_behavior = TRUE;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_fraud_detection ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE suspicious_behavior = FALSE ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE engagement_rate >= 3.00 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE suspicious_behavior = TRUE ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate ASC;

SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_fraud_detection WHERE followers_count > 500 AND engagement_rate < 5.00 ORDER BY followers_count ASC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count < 5000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT activity_id, influencer_id, activity_type FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(follower_count) AS max_followers, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement FROM Influencers GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING max_followers > 5000;

SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM Influencers JOIN SuspiciousActivities ON Influencers.influencer_id = SuspiciousActivities.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING total_activities > 3;

SELECT influencer_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM Influencers JOIN SuspiciousActivities ON Influencers.influencer_id = SuspiciousActivities.influencer_id WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count < 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, follower_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, activity_type, activity_description FROM Influencers JOIN SuspiciousActivities ON Influencers.influencer_id = SuspiciousActivities.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = 3 ORDER BY post_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(post_comments) AS avg_comments FROM Posts GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING avg_comments > 50;
SELECT * FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id WHERE followers_count > 10000;

SELECT influencer_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM Influencers JOIN SuspiciousActivities ON Influencers.influencer_id = SuspiciousActivities.influencer_id WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE post_date = '2022-01-01' AND likes_count > 100;
SELECT influencer_name, follow_date FROM Followers ORDER BY follow_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE likes_count > 100 AND comments_count < 50;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suspicious_Activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, influencer_name, COUNT(follower_id) AS total_followers FROM Influencers i JOIN Followers f ON i.influencer_id = f.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM Fraudulent_Activities WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 20 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM Influencers LEFT JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM Fraudulent_Activities GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY total_activities DESC LIMIT 3;
